alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pinellas County through 115 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over West And East Lealman, or over Pinellas Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Funnel cloud and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pinellas Park, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, West And East Lealman, Feather Sound, Gandy, Kenneth City, Tropicana Field, Sawgrass Lake Park, Crescent Lake, Lealman, and Snell Isle. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
